    • Cylinder

      public Cylinder​(double radius, Ray axisRay, double height)
      Constructor of the Cylinder We will represent cylinder by ray, radius and height
      Parameters:
      axisRay - the ray of the Tube
      radius - the radius of the Tube
      height - the height of the cylinder
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if radius is lower then 0 or the height is lower then 0
